Header.title: Welcome to Reps Discipline!
Header.paragraph: Thank you for your interest in Reps Discipline! This system is meant to give teachers time back in the classroom as well as give everyone in the school much needed data. Reps also facilitates parent to teacher communication and automates the process of giving students a restorative assignment when necessary. Please look at all the info provided to get an idea of what we do and how we can be of service to you and your school!

About.paragraph: Reps Discipline was created to make the discipline process easy for teachers and empowering for families. When a teacher needs to write up something positive or negative about a student they use an easy to use form which takes 2-3 minutes at most to complete. After this a group email is immediately created and sent to the parent, student, and teacher with information on what happened and any further action that needs to take place. If an assignment is necessary then the student can login and complete the assignment which should take no more than 3-5 minutes. Once the assignment is complete, that same group email from before is used to notify everyone of the successful completion. If there are any questions from any of the parties during the process then that email can be used to facilitate useful conversation between everyone involved.

Services.name: Automated Assignments
Services.text: Restorative assignments are automated so students and teachers can focus on schoolwork and not having to communicate back and forth about when something is done.

Services.name: Centralized Data
Services.text: Data is centralized on dashboards and easy to consume in order to take action steps. Charts are able to be customized to look at time periods and specific students.

Services.name: Record Keeping
Services.text: Student and Teacher data is collected as well as maintained throughout the life of the program. This allows both to transfer records when changing between Reps schools.

Services.name: Reading Comprehension
Services.text: Restorative assignments allow students to practice reading comprehension and subject matter pertains to whatever type of infraction caused the restorative assignment.

Services.name: Geographic flexiblity
Services.text: Since Reps is a cloud service you can use this as an entire school or as individual classes/departments.

Features.title: Instant Communication
Features.text: Reps will instantly create a group email between the student, parent, and teacher when a Positive Shout Out or Behavioral Concern occurs to open those lines of communication for all parties instantly.

Features.title: Automatic Rewards and Reprecussions
